pack.bugnet.hover_event: Click here to open the Bug Net Wiki
commands.bugnet.wrong_version: You are using Bug Net on the incorrect Minecraft version. You should be using Minecraft 1.20.2.
chat.bugnet.gamerules.title: Bug Net Gamerules
chat.bugnet.gamerules.capturesmallmobs.d: Toggle whether entities with the small_mob identifier can be captured
Toggle whether entities with the medium_mob identifier can be captured
